Rawḍat Khaṭīb Qāsim

oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in one column, 17 lines per page, in black and red, framed within double golden and black lines.
بحمدك اللهم على ما علمتنا من البيان والهتنا من التبيان ونشكرك على ما اسبغت علينا من الأحسان... :Incipit
According to colophon, copy completed in Dhū al-Qaʻdah 983 AH [February 1576 AD] in the hand of Ibrāhīm ibn Ḥasan ibn Pīr Mullā Ḥasan.
MS Arab SM206. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
